column4: i have a Linksys WUSB11 usb 802.11b wireless network adapter.. device manager finds it but doesn't know what it is... it's labled at unknown usb device... i think i have drivers for it but i dont know how to install them..
you don't need to install any drivers.
you don't (usually) need to install drivers. What usb device?
is your network interface up and running?
